response.original_title: Prices depreciated 1 million times, a poor boy becomes the richest man in the world!
response.overview: I woke up to find the world had changed! Prices everywhere have decreased by a million times, yet my funds remain the same, making me wealthier than the world’s richest person! How should I spend all this money…  Adapation of the manhua by the same name.
response.title: Prices depreciated 1 million times, a poor boy becomes the richest man in the world!
